inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Stamp

on back on sheet, in pencil: [#36.38.1]; on back of mount, in pencil: [#36.38.1] and [INV 1456]; on back of mount, in black ink: [29 (circled)]

signed: on back of sheet, in pencil: [Man in Doorway / Nathan Lerner / 1936] and [1936]; on back of mount, in pencil: [Man in Doorway / Maxwell Street / Nathan Lerner / 1936]
title: Man in Doorway, Maxwell Street, Chicago
